name: @blacket/core
description: Blacket Core, common for Backend and Discord Bot

scripts.prisma:push: dotenv -e ../.env -- bunx prisma db push --schema prisma
scripts.postinstall: sh -lc 'if [ "$SKIP_PRISMA_MIGRATE" = "1" ]; then echo Skipping prisma migrate deploy; else bunx prisma migrate deploy; fi' && bun run generate
